# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.getListing() method

Get a single direct listing

## Example 1

```javascript
const listingId = 0;
const listing = await contract.directListings.getListing(listingId);
```

## Example 2

```javascript
const listingId = 0;
const listing = await contract.directListings.getListing(listingId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getListing(listingId: BigNumberish): Promise<DirectListingV3>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| listingId | BigNumberish | the listing id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[DirectListingV3](./sdk.directlistingv3.md)&gt;

the Direct listing object
